name: Witch Hazel (SatsumaBeemo)
description:
A demo for a game I am making in GB Studio, a shoot-em-up with RPG elements. A portal has opened up in the sky and demons are attacking the local witches of the flower coven, Hazel defeats her assailant and sets out to find out what has happened to her friends.

Demo - also first game project, everything subject to change ^^ Leave feedback if you would be so kind ^^

Controls

Arrow keys for movement

Start = Enter

(Keyboard) Z, (Controller)A to shoot
